metadata.description: ISO 20022 message definitions - 54 messages across 24 business areas

payment_systems.name: Bacs
payment_systems.description: UK's automated payment system for Direct Debits and Direct Credits. Processes salary payments, bill payments, and subscriptions.

payment_systems.name: CHAPS
payment_systems.settlement: Real-time gross settlement via Bank of England
payment_systems.description: UK's high-value sterling payment system. Processes ~340 billion GBP daily for time-critical payments.

payment_systems.name: CHIPS
payment_systems.settlement: Multilateral netting with final settlement via Fedwire
payment_systems.description: US private-sector large-value payment system processing ~$1.8 trillion daily. Uses multilateral netting to reduce liquidity needs.

payment_systems.name: Faster Payments
payment_systems.settlement: Near real-time with deferred net settlement
payment_systems.description: UK's instant payment system enabling near-real-time payments up to 1 million GBP 24/7.

payment_systems.name: FedNow
payment_systems.description: Federal Reserve's instant payment service launched July 2023. Enables real-time payments 24/7/365.

payment_systems.name: Fedwire Funds
payment_systems.settlement: Real-time gross settlement in central bank money
payment_systems.description: The Federal Reserve's RTGS system for domestic USD payments. Processes ~$4 trillion daily.

payment_systems.name: Lynx
payment_systems.description: Bank of Canada's RTGS system replacing LVTS. ISO 20022 native from launch.

payment_systems.name: NPP
payment_systems.description: Australia's instant payment infrastructure enabling real-time payments with rich data (PayID, Osko).

payment_systems.name: RTP
payment_systems.description: The Clearing House's instant payment network. First new US payment rail in 40+ years, launched 2017.

payment_systems.name: SEPA
payment_systems.description: Harmonized euro payment scheme covering credit transfers, direct debits, and cards across 36 European countries.

payment_systems.name: SWIFT
payment_systems.full_name: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication
payment_systems.description: Global messaging network connecting 11,000+ financial institutions in 200+ countries. Uses ISO 20022 via CBPR+ (Cross-Border Payments and Reporting Plus).

payment_systems.name: TARGET2
payment_systems.full_name: Trans-European Automated Real-time Gross Settlement Express Transfer System
payment_systems.settlement: Real-time gross settlement in central bank money
payment_systems.description: The Eurosystem's RTGS system for large-value euro payments. Processes over 350,000 payments daily worth ~1.7 trillion EUR.

payment_systems.name: TIPS
payment_systems.description: Eurosystem's instant payment settlement service. Settles SEPA Instant Credit Transfers in central bank money.

payment_systems.name: Zengin
payment_systems.description: Japan's domestic funds transfer system connecting all Japanese banks. Processes 6+ million transactions daily.

messages.name: AccountOpeningInstruction
messages.usage: Open securities/fund account for client
messages.when_used: When new investment account needed

messages.name: AccountDetailsConfirmation
messages.usage: Custodian confirms account changes
messages.when_used: In response to account instruction

messages.name: AccountModificationInstruction
messages.usage: Update existing account information
messages.when_used: When account details need updating

messages.name: AccountOpeningRequest
messages.purpose: Request to open a new bank account
messages.when_used: When new account needs to be opened

messages.name: MessageReject
messages.when_used: When message cannot be processed due to technical errors
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:admi.002.001.01">
  <MsgRjct>
    <RltdRef>
      <Ref>PACS008-20240115-001</Ref>
    </RltdRef>
    <Rsn>
      <RjctgPtyRsn>XMLE</RjctgPtyRsn>
      <AddtlInf>Invalid XML: Element CdtrAgt missing required BICFI</AddtlInf>
    </Rsn>
  </MsgRjct>
</Document>

messages.name: InformationRequestResponse
messages.usage: Financial institution provides requested regulatory data
messages.when_used: In response to authority request

messages.name: CurrencyControlStatusReport
messages.usage: Report cross-border payment compliance to central bank
messages.when_used: For currency control reporting requirements

messages.name: ResolutionOfInvestigation
real_world_use_cases: Bank confirms payment recall was successful
messages.when_used: Response to camt.056 or other investigation

messages.name: BankToCustomerAccountReport
messages.purpose: Intraday account balance and transaction report
real_world_use_cases: Real-time treasury dashboard updates every 4 hours
Intraday liquidity monitoring for regulatory compliance
Cash position reporting to corporate HQ
Liquidity buffer monitoring for Basel III
messages.when_used: During business hours for real-time position updates

messages.name: BankToCustomerStatement
real_world_use_cases: Daily account reconciliation in SAP/Oracle ERP
messages.when_used: End of business day for complete activity summary
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:camt.053.001.10">
  <BkToCstmrStmt>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>STMT-20240115-EOD</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T23:59:00Z</CreDtTm>
    </GrpHdr>
    <Stmt>
      <Id>STMT-2024-01-15</Id>
      <ElctrncSeqNb>15</ElctrncSeqNb>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T23:59:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <Acct>
        <Id>
          <IBAN>GB82WEST12345698765432</IBAN>
        </Id>
        <Ccy>GBP</Ccy>
        <Nm>Main Operating Account</Nm>
      </Acct>
      <Bal>
        <Tp>
          <CdOrPrtry>
            <Cd>OPBD</Cd>
          </CdOrPrtry>
        </Tp>
        <Amt Ccy="GBP">100000.00</Amt>
        <CdtDbtInd>CRDT</CdtDbtInd>
        <Dt>
          <Dt>2024-01-15</Dt>
        </Dt>
      </Bal>
      <Bal>
        <Tp>
          <CdOrPrtry>
            <Cd>CLBD</Cd>
          </CdOrPrtry>
        </Tp>
        <Amt Ccy="GBP">125000.00</Amt>
        <CdtDbtInd>CRDT</CdtDbtInd>
        <Dt>
          <Dt>2024-01-15</Dt>
        </Dt>
      </Bal>
      <Ntry>
        <Amt Ccy="GBP">25000.00</Amt>
        <CdtDbtInd>CRDT</CdtDbtInd>
        <Sts>
          <Cd>BOOK</Cd>
        </Sts>
        <BookgDt>
          <Dt>2024-01-15</Dt>
        </BookgDt>
        <ValDt>
          <Dt>2024-01-15</Dt>
        </ValDt>
        <BkTxCd>
          <Domn>
            <Cd>PMNT</Cd>
          </Domn>
        </BkTxCd>
        <NtryDtls>
          <TxDtls>
            <Refs>
              <EndToEndId>E2E-INV-2024-001</EndToEndId>
            </Refs>
          </TxDtls>
        </NtryDtls>
      </Ntry>
    </Stmt>
  </BkToCstmrStmt>
</Document>

messages.name: BankToCustomerDebitCreditNotification
real_world_use_cases: Instant payment received notification to beneficiary
Salary credit alert to employee via mobile app
Real-time cash position update for treasury
messages.when_used: Immediately when transaction posts to account

messages.name: CustomerPaymentCancellationRequest
messages.purpose: Customer requests cancellation of a payment
real_world_use_cases: Stop payment on check/wire before settlement
messages.when_used: When customer needs to stop a payment before settlement
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:camt.055.001.11">
  <CstmrPmtCxlReq>
    <Assgnmt>
      <Id>CXLREQ-20240115-001</Id>
      <Assgnr>
        <Pty>
          <Nm>ABC Corporation</Nm>
        </Pty>
      </Assgnr>
      <Assgne>
        <Agt>
          <FinInstnId>
            <BICFI>WESTGB2LXXX</BICFI>
          </FinInstnId>
        </Agt>
      </Assgne>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T12:00:00Z</CreDtTm>
    </Assgnmt>
    <Undrlyg>
      <OrgnlPmtInfAndCxl>
        <OrgnlPmtInfId>SALARY-JAN-2024</OrgnlPmtInfId>
        <CxlRsnInf>
          <Rsn>
            <Cd>DUPL</Cd>
          </Rsn>
          <AddtlInf>Duplicate - paid by alternate method</AddtlInf>
        </CxlRsnInf>
      </OrgnlPmtInfAndCxl>
    </Undrlyg>
  </CstmrPmtCxlReq>
</Document>

messages.name: FIToFIPaymentCancellationRequest
messages.purpose: Bank requests another bank to cancel/return payment
real_world_use_cases: SWIFT gpi recall request for fraudulent payment
messages.when_used: After payment sent, when recall is needed

messages.name: NotificationToReceive
messages.usage: Pre-advise beneficiary about upcoming payment
messages.when_used: When beneficiary should be notified in advance of payment

messages.name: NotificationToCancelReceive
messages.purpose: Cancel a previously sent notification to receive
messages.usage: Inform that expected payment will not arrive
real_world_use_cases: Cancel pre-advice due to payment failure
messages.when_used: When previously notified payment won't be received

messages.name: AccountReportingRequest
messages.purpose: Request specific account report from bank
real_world_use_cases: Treasury requests historical statement for audit
Audit team requesting specific date range
messages.when_used: When customer needs specific account information on demand

messages.name: CollateralSubstitutionRequest
messages.usage: Request replacement of pledged securities
messages.when_used: When collateral needs to be exchanged

messages.name: CollateralManagementCancellationRequest
messages.usage: Cancel previous collateral movement
messages.when_used: To cancel collateral instruction

messages.name: ForeignExchangeTradeStatusNotification
messages.usage: Report FX trade processing status
messages.when_used: For FX trade lifecycle events

messages.name: ForeignExchangeTradeInstructionV04
messages.usage: Send FX trade details for settlement
messages.when_used: For FX trade settlement instruction

messages.name: ForeignExchangeTradeConfirmationRequestV01
messages.usage: Request counterparty to confirm FX trade
messages.when_used: To confirm FX trade with counterparty

messages.name: BusinessApplicationHeader
messages.purpose: Standard envelope header for all ISO 20022 messages
real_world_use_cases: Adding routing information to any MX message
Supporting SWIFT gpi with header info
messages.when_used: Required wrapper for every ISO 20022 business message

messages.name: FIToFIPaymentStatusReport
messages.purpose: Report the status of a payment instruction
real_world_use_cases: Bank confirms receipt of cross-border transfer to sending bank
Payment rejected due to sanctions screening - status sent back
SWIFT gpi tracking confirmation for corporate treasury
Real-time payment status update in instant payment networks
messages.when_used: After receiving pacs.008/pacs.009, to confirm acceptance or rejection

key_elements.GrpHdr/MsgId: Unique message identifier for this status report
key_elements.OrgnlGrpInfAndSts/OrgnlMsgId: Reference to the original payment message
key_elements.TxInfAndSts/StsRsnInf/Rsn/Cd: Reason code if rejected (e.g., AC04, AM04)

messages.name: FIToFICustomerDirectDebit
real_world_use_cases: SEPA Direct Debit collection for monthly subscriptions (Netflix, Spotify)
Utility company collecting bill payments across European banks
Insurance premium collection via direct debit mandate
B2B supplier collecting from corporate debtor accounts
messages.when_used: Creditor's bank sends to debtor's bank to collect funds

key_elements.GrpHdr/NbOfTxs: Number of direct debit transactions in batch
key_elements.DrctDbtTxInf/MndtRltdInf/MndtId: Mandate ID authorizing the direct debit
key_elements.DrctDbtTxInf/MndtRltdInf/DtOfSgntr: Date mandate was signed by debtor

messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.003.001.09">
  <FIToFICstmrDrctDbt>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>DD-BATCH-20240115</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T08:00:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
      <TtlIntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="EUR">99.99</TtlIntrBkSttlmAmt>
      <IntrBkSttlmDt>2024-01-16</IntrBkSttlmDt>
      <SttlmInf>
        <SttlmMtd>CLRG</SttlmMtd>
      </SttlmInf>
    </GrpHdr>
    <DrctDbtTxInf>
      <PmtId>
        <EndToEndId>NETFLIX-JAN-2024</EndToEndId>
      </PmtId>
      <IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="EUR">99.99</IntrBkSttlmAmt>
      <DrctDbtTx>
        <MndtRltdInf>
          <MndtId>MNDT-NFLX-123456</MndtId>
          <DtOfSgntr>2023-06-15</DtOfSgntr>
        </MndtRltdInf>
      </DrctDbtTx>
      <CdtrAgt>
        <FinInstnId>
          <BICFI>DEUTDEFFXXX</BICFI>
        </FinInstnId>
      </CdtrAgt>
      <Cdtr>
        <Nm>Netflix International BV</Nm>
      </Cdtr>
      <DbtrAgt>
        <FinInstnId>
          <BICFI>BNPAFRPPXXX</BICFI>
        </FinInstnId>
      </DbtrAgt>
      <Dbtr>
        <Nm>John Customer</Nm>
      </Dbtr>
    </DrctDbtTxInf>
  </FIToFICstmrDrctDbt>
</Document>

messages.name: PaymentReturn
real_world_use_cases: Beneficiary account closed - funds returned to sender
Name mismatch detected during IBAN validation (AC01)
Fraud suspected - bank returns payment to originator
Customer requests return within SEPA recall window
AML screening flags payment for return
messages.when_used: When payment cannot be applied and funds must be returned
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.004.001.11">
  <PmtRtr>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>RTN-20240116-001</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-16T14:30:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
      <TtlRtrdIntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="USD">5000.00</TtlRtrdIntrBkSttlmAmt>
    </GrpHdr>
    <OrgnlGrpInf>
      <OrgnlMsgId>PACS008-20240115-001</OrgnlMsgId>
      <OrgnlMsgNmId>pacs.008.001.10</OrgnlMsgNmId>
    </OrgnlGrpInf>
    <TxInf>
      <RtrId>RTN-TXN-001</RtrId>
      <OrgnlEndToEndId>E2E-INV-2024-001</OrgnlEndToEndId>
      <OrgnlUETR>eb6305c9-1f7f-49de-aed0-16487c27b42d</OrgnlUETR>
      <RtrdIntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="USD">5000.00</RtrdIntrBkSttlmAmt>
      <RtrRsnInf>
        <Rsn>
          <Cd>AC04</Cd>
        </Rsn>
        <AddtlInf>Account closed on 2024-01-10</AddtlInf>
      </RtrRsnInf>
    </TxInf>
  </PmtRtr>
</Document>

messages.name: FIToFIPaymentReversal
messages.purpose: Reverse a previously sent payment instruction
messages.usage: Used to reverse erroneous payments or when original payment needs to be undone
real_world_use_cases: Undo duplicate payment sent by error
messages.when_used: When original payment must be reversed before final settlement

messages.name: FIToFICustomerCreditTransfer
messages.purpose: Core interbank credit transfer carrying customer payment
real_world_use_cases: International wire transfer from US to UK bank account
Salary payment from company's bank to employee's bank
E-commerce payout to merchant's overseas bank
Cross-border supplier payment in manufacturing supply chain
SEPA credit transfer between Eurozone banks
FedNow instant payment for B2B invoice settlement
messages.when_used: Bank sends funds to another bank on behalf of a customer

key_elements.GrpHdr/MsgId: Unique identifier for this payment batch
key_elements.GrpHdr/NbOfTxs: Number of transactions in this message
key_elements.CdtTrfTxInf/PmtId/InstrId: Instruction ID assigned by sending bank
key_elements.CdtTrfTxInf/ChrgBr: Charge bearer: DEBT, CRED, SHAR, SLEV

messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pacs.008.001.10">
  <FIToFICstmrCdtTrf>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>PACS008-20240115-001</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T10:30:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
      <SttlmInf>
        <SttlmMtd>INDA</SttlmMtd>
      </SttlmInf>
    </GrpHdr>
    <CdtTrfTxInf>
      <PmtId>
        <InstrId>INSTR-2024-001</InstrId>
        <EndToEndId>E2E-INV-2024-001</EndToEndId>
        <UETR>eb6305c9-1f7f-49de-aed0-16487c27b42d</UETR>
      </PmtId>
      <IntrBkSttlmAmt Ccy="USD">5000.00</IntrBkSttlmAmt>
      <IntrBkSttlmDt>2024-01-15</IntrBkSttlmDt>
      <ChrgBr>SHAR</ChrgBr>
      <Dbtr>
        <Nm>Acme Corporation</Nm>
        <PstlAdr>
          <Ctry>US</Ctry>
        </PstlAdr>
      </Dbtr>
      <DbtrAcct>
        <Id>
          <Othr>
            <Id>123456789</Id>
          </Othr>
        </Id>
      </DbtrAcct>
      <DbtrAgt>
        <FinInstnId>
          <BICFI>CHASUS33XXX</BICFI>
          <Nm>JPMorgan Chase Bank</Nm>
        </FinInstnId>
      </DbtrAgt>
      <CdtrAgt>
        <FinInstnId>
          <BICFI>BABORAB2XXX</BICFI>
          <Nm>Barclays Bank PLC</Nm>
        </FinInstnId>
      </CdtrAgt>
      <Cdtr>
        <Nm>Global Supplies Ltd</Nm>
        <PstlAdr>
          <Ctry>GB</Ctry>
        </PstlAdr>
      </Cdtr>
      <CdtrAcct>
        <Id>
          <IBAN>GB29NWBK60161331926819</IBAN>
        </Id>
      </CdtrAcct>
      <RmtInf>
        <Ustrd>Invoice INV-2024-001 - Office Supplies</Ustrd>
      </RmtInf>
    </CdtTrfTxInf>
  </FIToFICstmrCdtTrf>
</Document>

messages.name: FinancialInstitutionCreditTransfer
messages.purpose: Bank-to-bank transfer (cover payment or own account transfer)
real_world_use_cases: Cover payment for correspondent banking (MT202 COV equivalent)
messages.when_used: For bank-to-bank transfers, often as cover for customer payments

key_elements.CdtTrfTxInf/UndrlygCstmrCdtTrf: Reference to underlying customer payment (if cover)

messages.name: FinancialInstitutionDirectDebit
messages.usage: Used for interbank liquidity management and treasury operations
messages.when_used: When one FI needs to debit another FI's account

messages.name: FIToFIPaymentStatusRequest
messages.purpose: Request status of a previously sent payment
real_world_use_cases: Corporate treasury tracking high-value wire status
Automated reconciliation system polling for status
messages.when_used: When sender needs confirmation of payment processing

messages.name: CustomerCreditTransferInitiation
messages.purpose: Customer instructs bank to execute credit transfer(s)
real_world_use_cases: Company payroll batch payment to 1000+ employees
Individual sending wire transfer via online banking
ERP system submitting automated payment file
messages.when_used: Customer submits payment instructions to their bank
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.001.001.11">
  <CstmrCdtTrfInitn>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>PAYROLL-202401</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-14T09:00:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>2</NbOfTxs>
      <CtrlSum>8500.00</CtrlSum>
      <InitgPty>
        <Nm>ABC Corporation</Nm>
        <Id>
          <OrgId>
            <Othr>
              <Id>ABC-CORP-001</Id>
            </Othr>
          </OrgId>
        </Id>
      </InitgPty>
    </GrpHdr>
    <PmtInf>
      <PmtInfId>SALARY-JAN-2024</PmtInfId>
      <PmtMtd>TRF</PmtMtd>
      <BtchBookg>true</BtchBookg>
      <NbOfTxs>2</NbOfTxs>
      <CtrlSum>8500.00</CtrlSum>
      <ReqdExctnDt>
        <Dt>2024-01-15</Dt>
      </ReqdExctnDt>
      <Dbtr>
        <Nm>ABC Corporation</Nm>
      </Dbtr>
      <DbtrAcct>
        <Id>
          <IBAN>GB82WEST12345698765432</IBAN>
        </Id>
      </DbtrAcct>
      <DbtrAgt>
        <FinInstnId>
          <BICFI>WESTGB2LXXX</BICFI>
        </FinInstnId>
      </DbtrAgt>
      <CdtTrfTxInf>
        <PmtId>
          <EndToEndId>SAL-EMP001-JAN24</EndToEndId>
        </PmtId>
        <Amt>
          <InstdAmt Ccy="GBP">5000.00</InstdAmt>
        </Amt>
        <CdtrAgt>
          <FinInstnId>
            <BICFI>NWBKGB2LXXX</BICFI>
          </FinInstnId>
        </CdtrAgt>
        <Cdtr>
          <Nm>John Employee</Nm>
        </Cdtr>
        <CdtrAcct>
          <Id>
            <IBAN>GB29NWBK60161331926819</IBAN>
          </Id>
        </CdtrAcct>
        <RmtInf>
          <Ustrd>Salary January 2024</Ustrd>
        </RmtInf>
      </CdtTrfTxInf>
    </PmtInf>
  </CstmrCdtTrfInitn>
</Document>

messages.name: CustomerPaymentStatusReport
messages.purpose: Bank reports status of customer payment instruction
real_world_use_cases: Bank confirms acceptance of payroll batch
Status update on pending international wire
Confirmation that payment file was processed
messages.when_used: Response to pain.001 indicating processing status

messages.name: CustomerPaymentReversal
messages.purpose: Customer requests reversal of previously initiated payment
real_world_use_cases: Employee termination - reverse last salary payment
messages.when_used: Customer needs to recall/reverse a payment after submission
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.007.001.11">
  <CstmrPmtRvsl>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>RVSL-20240115-001</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T11:00:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
    </GrpHdr>
    <OrgnlGrpInf>
      <OrgnlMsgId>PAYROLL-202401</OrgnlMsgId>
      <OrgnlMsgNmId>pain.001.001.11</OrgnlMsgNmId>
    </OrgnlGrpInf>
    <OrgnlPmtInfAndRvsl>
      <OrgnlPmtInfId>SALARY-JAN-2024</OrgnlPmtInfId>
      <RvslRsnInf>
        <Rsn>
          <Cd>DUPL</Cd>
        </Rsn>
        <AddtlInf>Duplicate payment - already paid via check</AddtlInf>
      </RvslRsnInf>
    </OrgnlPmtInfAndRvsl>
  </CstmrPmtRvsl>
</Document>

messages.name: CustomerDirectDebitInitiation
real_world_use_cases: Landlord collecting rent via standing mandate
messages.when_used: Creditor submits direct debit collection to their bank
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.008.001.10">
  <CstmrDrctDbtInitn>
    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>DD-COLLECT-202401</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-10T08:00:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
      <CtrlSum>49.99</CtrlSum>
      <InitgPty>
        <Nm>StreamFlix Inc</Nm>
      </InitgPty>
    </GrpHdr>
    <PmtInf>
      <PmtInfId>SUBS-JAN-2024</PmtInfId>
      <PmtMtd>DD</PmtMtd>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
      <CtrlSum>49.99</CtrlSum>
      <ReqdColltnDt>2024-01-15</ReqdColltnDt>
      <Cdtr>
        <Nm>StreamFlix Inc</Nm>
      </Cdtr>
      <CdtrAcct>
        <Id>
          <IBAN>NL91ABNA0417164300</IBAN>
        </Id>
      </CdtrAcct>
      <CdtrAgt>
        <FinInstnId>
          <BICFI>ABNANL2AXXX</BICFI>
        </FinInstnId>
      </CdtrAgt>
      <DrctDbtTxInf>
        <PmtId>
          <EndToEndId>SUBS-CUST123-JAN24</EndToEndId>
        </PmtId>
        <InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">49.99</InstdAmt>
        <DrctDbtTx>
          <MndtRltdInf>
            <MndtId>MNDT-STREAMFLIX-123</MndtId>
            <DtOfSgntr>2023-03-01</DtOfSgntr>
          </MndtRltdInf>
        </DrctDbtTx>
        <DbtrAgt>
          <FinInstnId>
            <BICFI>INGBNL2AXXX</BICFI>
          </FinInstnId>
        </DbtrAgt>
        <Dbtr>
          <Nm>Peter Customer</Nm>
        </Dbtr>
        <DbtrAcct>
          <Id>
            <IBAN>NL39INGB0002445588</IBAN>
          </Id>
        </DbtrAcct>
      </DrctDbtTxInf>
    </PmtInf>
  </CstmrDrctDbtInitn>
</Document>

messages.name: MandateInitiationRequest
messages.purpose: Request to set up a direct debit mandate
messages.usage: Customer authorizes merchant to collect payments via direct debit
real_world_use_cases: Digital mandate signing via banking app
messages.when_used: When customer authorizes recurring direct debit

messages.name: MandateAmendmentRequest
messages.purpose: Request to amend an existing direct debit mandate
messages.usage: Update mandate details like amount, frequency, or account
messages.when_used: When existing mandate terms need modification

messages.name: MandateCancellationRequest
messages.purpose: Request to cancel a direct debit mandate
messages.usage: Customer or creditor cancels a direct debit arrangement
messages.when_used: When mandate should be terminated

messages.name: CreditorPaymentActivationRequest
messages.purpose: Request to Pay - Payee requests payment from payer
mt_equivalent: No MT equivalent - new ISO 20022 only
real_world_use_cases: Invoice presentment with embedded payment request
E-commerce checkout with Request to Pay
Utility bill with one-click payment option
messages.when_used: When payee wants to request payment from payer instead of waiting
messages.sample_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.013.001.09">

    <GrpHdr>
      <MsgId>R2P-20240115-001</MsgId>
      <CreDtTm>2024-01-15T09:00:00Z</CreDtTm>
      <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs>
      <InitgPty>
        <Nm>Online Store Ltd</Nm>
      </InitgPty>
    </GrpHdr>
    <PmtInf>
      <PmtInfId>R2P-INV-001</PmtInfId>
      <PmtMtd>TRF</PmtMtd>
      <ReqdExctnDt>
        <Dt>2024-01-20</Dt>
      </ReqdExctnDt>
      <XpryDt>
        <Dt>2024-01-25</Dt>
      </XpryDt>
      <Dbtr>
        <Nm>Customer Name</Nm>
      </Dbtr>
      <CdtTrfTx>
        <PmtId>
          <EndToEndId>INV-2024-001</EndToEndId>
        </PmtId>
        <Amt>
          <InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">199.99</InstdAmt>
        </Amt>
        <Cdtr>
          <Nm>Online Store Ltd</Nm>
        </Cdtr>
        <CdtrAcct>
          <Id>
            <IBAN>DE89370400440532013000</IBAN>
          </Id>
        </CdtrAcct>
        <RmtInf>
          <Ustrd>Invoice INV-2024-001 - Electronics Purchase</Ustrd>
        </RmtInf>
      </CdtTrfTx>
    </PmtInf>
  </CdtrPmtActvtnReq>
</Document>

messages.name: SecuritiesAccountReference
messages.usage: Distribute account reference information
messages.when_used: For account reference data management

messages.name: RemittanceAdvice
messages.purpose: Detailed remittance information separate from payment
mt_equivalent: No direct equivalent - extended from MT103
real_world_use_cases: Corporate sends invoice matching details to supplier
Bulk payment with multiple invoice references
AP system sending remittance for reconciliation
messages.when_used: When remittance details exceed payment message capacity

messages.name: CorporateActionNotification
messages.usage: Inform investors of dividends, splits, mergers, etc.
messages.when_used: When corporate action occurs

messages.name: CorporateActionEventProcessingStatusAdvice
messages.purpose: Advise on corporate action processing status
messages.usage: Report status of corporate action instruction
messages.when_used: To update on corporate action processing

messages.name: CorporateActionInstructionV09
messages.usage: Client elects option for corporate action
messages.when_used: When client makes corporate action election

messages.name: SecuritiesBalanceAccountingReport
messages.purpose: Report securities balances in custody account
messages.usage: Custodian reports holdings to client
messages.when_used: For regular securities position reporting

messages.name: SecuritiesBalanceCustodyReport
messages.usage: Detailed custody position reporting
messages.when_used: For detailed custody holdings reporting

messages.name: IntraPositionMovementInstruction
messages.purpose: Instruct movement of securities within same account
messages.usage: Transfer between sub-accounts or segregated positions
messages.when_used: When securities need to move within same account structure

messages.name: SecuritiesSettlementTransactionInstruction
messages.purpose: Instruct settlement of a securities transaction
messages.usage: Used to settle securities trades in central securities depositories
messages.when_used: When securities trade needs to be settled

messages.name: SecuritiesSettlementTransactionConfirmation
messages.usage: CSD confirms that settlement has been completed
messages.when_used: When settlement is completed

messages.name: SecuritiesSettlementTransactionStatusAdvice
messages.usage: Inform parties of settlement status changes
messages.when_used: When settlement status changes

messages.name: SecuritiesSettlementTransactionAllegementReport
messages.usage: Notify of allegement (unmatched instruction received)
messages.when_used: When CSD receives instruction without matching counterparty

messages.name: SubscriptionOrderV04
messages.purpose: Order to subscribe to investment fund
messages.usage: Investor places order to buy fund shares
messages.when_used: When investor wants to purchase fund units

messages.name: RedemptionOrderV04
messages.purpose: Order to redeem investment fund shares
messages.usage: Investor sells fund shares back to fund
messages.when_used: When investor wants to sell fund units

messages.name: SubscriptionOrderConfirmationV04
messages.usage: Fund confirms purchase of fund shares
messages.when_used: When subscription order is executed

messages.name: RedemptionOrderConfirmationV04
messages.usage: Fund confirms sale of fund shares
messages.when_used: When redemption order is executed

payment_flows.name: Cross-Border Credit Transfer (SWIFT CBPR+)
payment_flows.description: End-to-end international wire transfer via correspondent banking with gpi tracking
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: US company Acme Corp pays UK supplier Global Supplies Ltd $5,000 for office equipment. Payment routed through correspondent banking network with full gpi visibility.

steps.description: Acme Corp submits payment via corporate banking portal
JPMorgan validates and confirms receipt of instruction
Interbank payment sent via SWIFT with UETR tracking
Correspondent confirms receipt (gpi status: ACSP)
Payment forwarded to Barclays UK
Barclays confirms credit applied (gpi status: ACCC)
Real-time credit notification to Global Supplies Ltd

payment_flows.name: SEPA Direct Debit Collection
payment_flows.description: Recurring payment collection within SEPA zone using SDD Core scheme
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Netflix collects monthly subscription fees from 1 million European customers using SEPA Direct Debit mandates signed during account creation.

steps.description: Netflix submits direct debit collection batch (1M transactions)
ABN AMRO validates mandates and confirms batch accepted
Direct debits sent to EBA STEP2 clearing
Collection instructions distributed to debtor banks
Debtor banks confirm debits (or reject with R-codes)
SMS/Push notification: '49.99 EUR debited for Netflix'
Bulk credit notification confirms collection success

payment_flows.name: Payment Recall (SWIFT gpi)
payment_flows.description: Recalling a fraudulent payment using SWIFT gpi Stop and Recall
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Corporate customer reports business email compromise (BEC) fraud. Bank initiates emergency recall within 2 hours of payment.

steps.description: Original payment sent: $500,000 to fraudster account
gpi recall request initiated with reason FRAD (fraud)
Response within 24h: Recall accepted, funds recovered
Funds returned via pacs.004 PaymentReturn
Credit notification: Funds recovered from fraud

payment_flows.name: FedNow Instant Payment
payment_flows.description: Real-time payment settlement in seconds via Federal Reserve's instant payment system
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Small business pays contractor immediately after job completion. Payment settles in under 5 seconds with instant confirmation.

steps.description: Contractor payment initiated via mobile banking app
Instant payment sent to FedNow (<1 second)
Delivered to payee's bank in real-time
Confirmation within 5 seconds total
Push notification: 'You received $2,500 from ABC Plumbing'
Confirmation: Payment completed successfully

payment_flows.name: CHIPS Large Value Transfer
payment_flows.description: High-value USD payment through CHIPS multilateral netting system
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Bank of America moves $50 million for corporate client acquisition. Payment netted with other CHIPS transactions for liquidity efficiency.

steps.description: Large value FI transfer submitted to CHIPS
Payment queued for multilateral netting cycle
Status: Payment matched and released
Settled payment delivered to receiving bank
End-of-day net settlement via Fedwire

payment_flows.name: TARGET2 RTGS Settlement
payment_flows.description: Real-time gross settlement in central bank money via Eurosystem
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Deutsche Bank settles large interbank EUR position with BNP Paribas using central bank money for immediate finality.

steps.description: EUR 100M FI transfer to TARGET2
Real-time settlement in central bank accounts
Settlement confirmed (immediate finality)
Credit applied to receiving bank's account
End-of-day statement with all settlements

payment_flows.name: Request to Pay (SEPA RTP)
payment_flows.description: Payee initiates payment request that payer approves
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Online store sends Request to Pay with invoice details. Customer reviews and approves payment with one click in banking app.

steps.description: Merchant initiates Request to Pay for EUR 199.99
Request forwarded to SEPA R2P infrastructure
Request delivered to customer's bank
Push notification: 'Online Store requests EUR 199.99'
Customer approves with fingerprint in banking app
SEPA Instant Credit Transfer executed
Merchant receives instant payment confirmation

payment_flows.name: Corporate Payroll (Multi-Bank)
payment_flows.description: Batch salary payments to employees across multiple banks
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Fortune 500 company processes monthly payroll for 50,000 employees across 200+ banks with same-day settlement.

steps.description: ERP uploads payroll file (50,000 payments, $75M total)
Batch validated - all IBANs/account numbers verified
Payments submitted to clearing system
Payments distributed to 200+ receiving banks
Salary credit notifications sent to all employees
End-of-day statement confirms all payments settled

payment_flows.name: CHAPS Same-Day Sterling
payment_flows.description: UK high-value sterling payment with same-day settlement
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Law firm transfers house purchase funds (GBP 2M) to seller's solicitor. Must settle same-day before completion deadline.

steps.description: Solicitor initiates urgent property completion payment
CHAPS payment submitted (ISO 20022 format)
Settlement across Bank of England accounts
Settlement confirmed within minutes
Credit applied to receiving bank
Seller's solicitor confirms funds received

payment_flows.name: Faster Payments (UK Instant)
payment_flows.description: UK instant payment for retail and SME transactions
payment_flows.real_world_scenario: Consumer pays tradesperson immediately after home repair using mobile banking. Payment arrives in seconds.

steps.description: Customer initiates payment via banking app
Instant payment to Faster Payments Service
Delivered to payee bank in seconds
Confirmation of credit
Tradesperson receives instant notification
Payment confirmed to customer
